title: Practicescape-Based Mathematics Learning Design: Focusing on Emotions and Possibilities

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental mathematical concepts (monomials, polynomials, functions, etc.)
context.additional_context: Designing practical and emotionally engaging mathematics learning experiences in smartphone-based constrained technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain mathematical modeling processes using seven practical landscapes (Practicescapes) in everyday problem situations
Learners can record and share positive emotions (curiosity, achievement, etc.) occurring during math concept learning in diary or poetic forms
Learners can produce project outcomes reflecting the meaning of math learning within finite life contexts

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
